MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are working on site and in order to carry out a full repair, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will now work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:07pm on Monday 11th January 2021
